97 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccDictEntry
98 {
99 public: //member functions
100  CIccDictEntry();
101  CIccDictEntry(const CIccDictEntry& IDE);
102  CIccDictEntry &operator=(const CIccDictEntry &IDE);
103  virtual ~CIccDictEntry();
104 
105  void Describe(std::string &sDescription);
106 
107  icUInt32Number PosRecSize();
108 
109  //Data
110  CIccUTF16String m_sName;
111 
112  const CIccUTF16String &GetValue() { return m_sValue; }
113  bool IsValueSet() { return m_bValueSet; }
114 
115  //GetNameLocalized and GetValueLocalized both give direct access to objects owned by the CIccDirEntry object
116  CIccTagMultiLocalizedUnicode* GetNameLocalized() { return m_pNameLocalized; }
117  CIccTagMultiLocalizedUnicode* GetValueLocalized() { return m_pValueLocalized; }
118 
119  void UnsetValue() { m_sValue.Clear(); m_bValueSet = false; }
120  bool SetValue(const CIccUTF16String &sValue);
121 
122  //SetNameLocalized and SetValueLocalized both transfer ownership of the argument to the CIccDirEntry object
123  //deleting access to previous object
124  bool SetNameLocalized(CIccTagMultiLocalizedUnicode *pNameLocalized);
125  bool SetValueLocalized(CIccTagMultiLocalizedUnicode *pValueLocalized);
126 
127 protected:
128  CIccUTF16String m_sValue;
129  bool m_bValueSet;
130 
131  CIccTagMultiLocalizedUnicode *m_pNameLocalized;
132  CIccTagMultiLocalizedUnicode *m_pValueLocalized;
133 };

136 {
137 public:
138  CIccDictEntry *ptr;
139 };

157 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccTagDict : public CIccTag
158 {
159 public:
160  CIccTagDict();

164  virtual ~CIccTagDict();
165

167  virtual const icChar *GetClassName() const { return "CIccTagDict"; }

209  bool SetValueLocalized(const CIccUTF16String &sName, CIccTagMultiLocalizedUnicode *pTag);
210 
211  CIccNameValueDict *m_Dict;
212 
213 protected:
214  bool m_bBadAlignment;
215  void Cleanup();
216  icUInt32Number MaxPosRecSize();
217 
218  icUInt32Number m_tagSize;
219  icUInt32Number m_tagStart;
220 };
